Umphandle > Urhulumente > Die Regering van Suid-Afrika > IKhabhinethi > Icandelo loMphathiswa Weenkonzo Zoluntu Nolawulo

ICANDELO LOMPHATHISWA WEENKONZO ZOLUNTU NOLAWULO: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



ICandelo loMphathiswa lilo elijongene nemigaqo-nkqubo nokuqulunqwa kwemithetho ngokubhekiselele kwiinkonzo zoluntu nolawulo. ICandelo loMphathiswa likwajongene:
* nokusungula imigaqo-nkqubo nemithetho yesizwe
* nokulungelelanisa imisebenzi yeSebe leeNkonzo zoLuntu noLawulo, iKomishoni yeeNkonzo zoLuntu kunye neZiko loMzantsi Afrika loPhuhliso lwaBaphathi.
* nokuqulunqa kwanokusungula imithetho
* nokuqhuba nayiphi na eminye imisebenzi yolawulo emiselwe kuMgaqo-siseko okanye kwimithetho yesizwe.
